summary: An Iranian man drives his truck in search of someone who will quietly bury him under a cherry tree after he commits suicide.
cast: Homayoun Ershadi|Abdolrahman Bagheri|Afshin Khorshid Bakhtiari|Safar Ali Moradi|Mir Hossein Noori|Ahmad Ansari
keywords: suicide|abrupt ending|driving a car|conversation in a car|iran
title: El sabor de las cerezas
